column2: I feel like this is what Texas BBQ should be all about! Got the pound of briskets and finished it all in one sitting. Going to try my best to use the correct BBQ terminology but the smoke ring looked great
column3: the crust that packs so much flavor
column4: and incredibly juicy inside. As one can imagine
column5: it is on the pricier side
column6: but well worth trying while in Houston.
